mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todolist (id, createdtime, deadline, content, isdone, priority, userid) VALUES (#{id}, #{createdTime}, #{deadline}, #{content}, #{isDone}, #{priority}, #{userId})
mapper.update:
UPDATE todolist
createdtime = #{createdTime},
deadline = #{deadline},
content = #{content},
isdone = #{isDone},
priority = #{priority},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM todolist WHERE id = #{id} AND userid = #{userId}
